Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: A4 & A3 photocopier, newspapers and journals, talking books, CDs, DVDs, language tapes and books in Chinese. Activities include Baby Time, Story Time for under 5s and Chatterbooks for 8-12 year olds. Provides 4 People's Network computers (1 dedicated for use by children), all with Microsoft Office and Internet access, and a scanner, all for public use.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 10am-7.30pm, Tues, Wed & Fri 10am-5.30pm, Thurs closed, Sat 10am-4pm (opening times); Mon 6.30-7.30pm (monthly reading group, see separate entry), Tues 10am-12noon (craft group, term-time, see separate entry), 4-5pm Homework Zone, term-time), Wed 10am-12noon (knitting group)
